getAddress() - Method in class models.Customer
 
getAllAppointments() - Static method in class DatabaseControls.DatabaseQueries
This method pulls the info from the appointments table and translates it into an appointment object to be used in the code
getAllAppointmentsInDatabase() - Static method in class models.AppointmentDatabase
This will empty the list of appointments, then send the clean list through to the Datbase Query to populate it, ensuring that each time the populate appointments is asked for, the lsit contains all the most up-to-date appointments and their information.
getAllCustomers() - Static method in class DatabaseControls.DatabaseQueries
This method pulls the info form the customers table in the database and translates it into an array of customer objects to be used throughout the code
getAllCustomersInDatabase() - Static method in class models.CustomerDatabase
This will empty the list of customers, then send the clean list through to the Datbase Query to populate it, ensuring that each time the populate customers is asked for, the lsit contains all the most up-to-date information.

getConnection() - Static method in class DatabaseControls.DatabaseConnection

getContact() - Method in class models.Appointment
 
getContactID(String) - Static method in class DatabaseControls.DatabaseQueries
Gets the ID value of the contact the user selects from the contact combo box in the appointments screens
getContactName(String) - Static method in class DatabaseControls.DatabaseQueries
This method translates the "Contact ID" from the database in the name of the contact to be used in the appointment form
getContacts() - Static method in class DatabaseControls.DatabaseQueries
This creates a List of String objects filled with Contact names from the database table contacts to populate a combo box on the AppointmentAdd and AppointmentModify screens.
getCountryFromDivision(String) - Static method in class DatabaseControls.DatabaseQueries
This is a small method that is used in part to populate a combo box in the CustomerInfoModifyController.

getDivision_ID(String) - Static method in class DatabaseControls.DatabaseQueries
This method is used to take in the named city in the Customer object and convert it to a Division_Id to relate to the Country-level information in the Database.
getEndDateTime() - Method in class models.Appointment
 
getFirstLevelName(String) - Static method in class DatabaseControls.DatabaseQueries
This method tanslates the "Division_ID" from the customer table to translate it into actual location names
getLocation() - Method in class models.Appointment
 
getLocations(Integer) - Static method in class DatabaseControls.DatabaseQueries
This takes in the countryID input from the Customer create/edit screens's combo boxes and uses that country code to output a string list of first-level locations to be used to populate the first-level/location combo box.
getNewApptID() - Static method in class DatabaseControls.DatabaseQueries
This will create a unique appointment id for a user-created appointment by parsing a list of all appointment id's, pulling out the largest value, then adding 1 to it to set a new, unique appointment
getNewCustomerID() - Static method in class DatabaseControls.DatabaseQueries
This will take in all the ID's from the customers table in the database, find out the largest one, and then add one to it to create a new/unique ID for a newly created customer.
getNewCustomerID() - Static method in class models.CustomerDatabase
Used to generate a new Customer ID based on the the largest existing Customer ID plus one
getPhone() - Method in class models.Customer
 
getPostal_Code() - Method in class models.Customer
 
getResourceBundle(Locale) - Static method in class utilities.LanguageControl
This takes in the user's locale, and outputs the resource bundle object to update all the text in the program to the user's language selection

getUserLocation() - Static method in class utilities.LanguageControl
This determines the user's Location, displays it, and also decides whether the user information should be in english or french depending on their locale.
